subject: Mental Health
title: Childhood Anxiety
description: A quick win: understand Childhood Anxiety.

hook.text: A child who clings and cries at school drop-off may not be misbehaving.

buildup.text: Separation anxiety is normal in toddlers but can persist and intensify.

discovery.text: About 7 percent of children have a diagnosable anxiety disorder.

twist.text: Anxious children often get labeled shy or difficult rather than unwell.

climax.text: Early intervention dramatically improves outcomes and prevents adult disorders.
